author: mrmitch
title: Keep a kid happy for 24 days until the big one!
review: My daughters birthday is in late nov. so I got her this for her 7th birthday. She would bounce out of bed every morning before school so she could see what little set was there for the day. We would put it together and put it back in its door, we didn't combine anything until after everything was opened. The cool thing was most of the little sets came with there own instruction sheet. These are very good sets for kids 6-10 fun for them and the big kid who helps put them together - recommend them.
